section.title: Value Storage Plugin for Data Container

note.para: The value-storage element is optional. If you don't include it, the values will be stored as BLOBs inside the database.

section.para: value-storage: Optional value Storage plugin definition.
class: A value storage plugin class name (attribute).
properties: The list of properties (name-value pairs) for a concrete Value Storage plugin.
filters: The list of filters defining conditions when this plugin is applicable.
